Player History
Injured on 8/23/2013 with a Fractured Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Miami to Milwaukee on 7/19/2014 (Going to MIL: P Brad Hand, RF Marcell Ozuna. Going to MIA: P Yovani Gallardo, P Devin Williams)...
Injured on 9/2/2014 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 2/9/2015.
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/6/2016, off Brad Brach (SD)...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $685,714 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2019, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,896,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,018,571 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/9/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $10,100,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2022, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 9/29/2022 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Texas, driving in 6 runs on 7/22/2023...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2024, hitting .438 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
10/28/2024: Signed a contract extension with New York (A), $12,100,000 per year, for 4 years.
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles (A) on 8/24/2025...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Toronto on 4/20/2026...
